subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The former Indianapolis 500 winner Juan Pablo Montoya won the pole position for Sunday’s Brickyard 400 Nascar Sprint Cup race with a lap of 182.278 miles per hour in Indianapolis.
snippet: The former Indianapolis 500 winner Juan Pablo Montoya won the pole position for Sunday’s Brickyard 400 Nascar Sprint Cup race with a lap of 182.278 miles per hour in Indianapolis.
